Detailed Description

Objects of sub classes to this class is used to group other items.

This is a very powerful way of grouping items, so it must be used with care. One example of grouping is OldStreetItem, that groups OldStreetSegmentItems into, what a human calls, streets. An other example is OldZipCodeItem that groups a lot of OldStreetSegmentItems that have the same zip code.

Definition at line 29 of file OldGroupItem.h.
